an5.24:1.2: sammasamadhimhi asati sammasamadhivipannassa hatupanisam hoti yathabhutananadassanam;
an5.24:1.3: yathabhutananadassane asati yathabhutananadassanavipannassa hatupaniso hoti nibbidavirago;
an5.24:1.4: nibbidavirage asati nibbidaviragavipannassa hatupanisam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an5.24:1.6: Tassa papatikapi na paripurim gacchati, tacopi na paripurim gacchati, pheggupi na paripurim gacchati, saropi na paripurim gacchati;
an5.24:1.7: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, dussilassa silavipannassa hatupaniso hoti sammasamadhi;
an5.24:1.8: sammasamadhimhi asati sammasamadhivipannassa hatupanisam hoti yathabhutananadassanam;
an5.24:1.9: yathabhutananadassane asati yathabhutananadassanavipannassa hatupaniso hoti nibbidavirago;
an5.24:1.10: nibbidavirage asati nibbidaviragavipannassa hatupanisam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an5.24:2.1: Silavato, bhikkhave, silasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammasamadhi;
an5.24:2.2: sammasamadhimhi sati sammasamadhisampannassa upanisasampannam hoti yathabhutananadassanam;
an5.24:2.3: yathabhutananadassane sati yathabhutananadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidavirago;
an5.24:2.4: nibbidavirage sati nibbidaviragasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an5.24:2.5: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, rukkho sakhapalasasampanno. Tassa papatikapi paripurim gacchati, tacopi paripurim gacchati, pheggupi paripurim gacchati, saropi paripurim gacchati;
an5.24:2.6: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, silavato silasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammasamadhi;
an5.24:2.7: sammasamadhimhi sati sammasamadhisampannassa upanisasampannam hoti yathabhutananadassanam;
an5.24:2.8: yathabhutananadassane sati yathabhutananadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidavirago;
an5.24:2.9: nibbidavirage sati nibbidaviragasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti vimuttinanadassanan”ti.
